Name: ecnepsnai
AboutMe:
Hi there, I'm Ian Spence! I am a full-stack web engineer and mobile application developer.

I am a Jr. Web Developer at Fortinet Technologies Inc and studied Enterprise Network Systems Administration and Network Security at the British Columbia Institute of Technology. I am a passionate mobile and web developer who loves working with security.

I am skilled in many areas of Web Development using powerful frameworks like Django (Python), Sinatra (Ruby), PHP. As well, I am also skilled in front-end Web Design using jQuery, Angular, and other Javascript engines.

For mobile development, I am very skilled in Objective-C and have some experience using Swift. I am also able to develop Android applications in Java.

Outside of development, I have skills in these areas:

  • Linux Administration (RHEL, SuSE)
  • Unix Administration (Solaris)
  • SQL Database Administration
  • Enterprise networking (CCNA Routing and Switching Certified)
  • Microsoft Active Directory (including Microsoft Office Exchange)
  • Windows Server 2008 and 2012 Administration
  • Virtualization (HyperV, Azure, VirtualBox & Oracle Containers, VMWare)
  • Enterprise VoIP (Cisco Voice and Microsoft Offline Lync)
  • Web Server Configuration (including Apache & NGINX)

You can reach me through the contact form on my website, Twitter, LinkedIn, or email.
